title: Stringy Scaling
authors: Sheng-Hong Lai, Jen-Chi Lee and Yi Yang
abstract:
We discover a general stringy scaling behavior for 1. All n-point hard string
scattering amplitudes (HSSA) and 2. A class of n-point Regge string scattering
amplitudes (RSSA) to all string loop orders. The number of independent
kinematics variables is found to be reduced by dim M.
